item.title: Simple Virtualization Linux
item.description: List kvm using virsh virsh list virsh list --all virsh --help Create vm on kvm / qemu via libvirt with command line Pembuatan vm centos 7 script bash virtcen.sh #!/bin/bash NAMA=$1 if [ -z "$1" ]; then while [ -z "$NAMA" ]; do echo -n "masukan nama vm: " read NAMA done fi virt-install \ --name $NAMA \ --ram 900 \ --disk path=$NAMA.qcow,size=6,bus=scsi,discard='unmap',format='qcow2' \ --controller type=scsi,model=virtio-scsi \ --vcpus 1 \ --cpu host \ --console pty,target_type=serial \ --location /iso/CentOS-7.
